keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The Indianapolis-based company announced on Wednesday that Mr. Oesterle was leaving, in part, to become more “civically involved” in the state’s issues.

headline.print_headline: Angie’s List Chief Executive Steps Down
headline.main: William Oesterle, Chief Executive of Angie’s List, to Step Down

snippet: The Indianapolis-based company announced on Wednesday that Mr. Oesterle was leaving, in part, to become more “civically involved” in the state’s issues.
abstract: Angie's List announces that chief executive William S Oesterle is stepping down, only weeks after he led businesses in opposing Indiana religious freedom law that many viewed to be discriminatory against gays; Indiana-based company says Oesterle plans to become more involved in state issues.
